alert.note: Alert for Osborne; Phillips; Rooks; Smith (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 15 at 2:29PM CDT until October 16 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 9 AM CDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 29 to 31 degrees expected. * WHERE...Portions of north central Kansas and central and south central Nebraska. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 9 AM CDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Clearing skies overnight and light winds should allow for temperatures to fall to near or just below freezing and widespread frost formation by dawn Monday morning.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
